summary: A haunted Scottish castle is dismantled and transported to Florida, bringing the family ghost along with it.
cast: Robert Donat|Jean Parker|Eugene Pallette|Elsa Lanchester|Ralph Bunker|Patricia Hilliard|Everley Gregg|Morton Selten|Chili Bouchier|Mark Daly|Herbert Lomas|Elliott Mason|Hay Petrie|Quinton McPherson|Peter Cozens|Syd Crossley|Richard Fraser|David Keir|Jack Lambert|Colin Lesslie|Neil Lester|J. Neil More|Victor Rietti|Arthur Seaton|Ernest Sefton|Terry-Thomas
title: El fantasma va al Oeste
